attributes.action: Ban the sale general of fireworks, restricting use to organised displays only
attributes.additional_details: Animals are terrified of these loud noises. It's getting worse and worse each year. This affects all animals: pets and wildlife. I do enjoy fireworks, but they are ultimately cruel and unnecessary. Organised displays on set dates are great, but not everyone setting them off at all hours.
attributes.background: Ban sale of fireworks to private individuals and restrict to organised displays only for the benefit of animals, pets and the environment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  

Limit the sale and use of Fireworks to licence holders only - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
